name: Escape Cat
description:
Oh no, Noelle the cat is lost and she doesn't know how to get home. But her date, cat Jimmy, is already waiting for her at home. Will you help her? Guide Noelle, the little black cat, through all sorts of mazes and puzzles. But be careful, watch out for the nasty dogs and bouncing balls.

Controls
This game was designed to be played on the smartphone. But of course, control via keyboard is also possible (Arrow-Key to move)

This awaits you in Escape Cat:

- Arcade Gameplay
- Charming retro graphics in the style of the old GameBoy handheld
- Classic 8bit music
- 96 levels full of puzzles, mazes and nasty enemies

Have fun :)
